name: Roberto Barbuti
content: Roberto Barbuti Roberto Barbuti Full Professor at the Department of Computer Science of the University of Pisa Coordinates Office : 334 DO Mail : Universita' di Pisa, Dipartimento di Informatica Largo B. Pontecorvo, 3 - 56127 Pisa - Italy Phone : +39 050 221 2747 E-mail : barbuti@di.unipi.it Teaching (Didattica) Fondamenti di programmazione Programmazione 1 e Laboratorio (a.a. precedenti) Regole esame orale Programmazione 1 e Laboratorio (a.a. 2017/18) Programmazione 1 e Laboratorio  (a.a. 2018/19) Programmazione 1 e Laboratorio  (a.a. 2019/20) Ricevimento studenti: giovedì 12.00  15.00 Short Bio Born in San Giuliano Terme (Pisa), Italy on August 10, 1953 Master Degree in Computer Science obtained in June 1977 at the University of Pisa Research fellow from 1977 to 1982 at the Istituto per lElaborazione dellInformazione, CNR, Pisa. Assistant Professor from 1982 to 1989 at the Department of Computer Science, University of Pisa. Asoociate Professor from 1989 to 2000 at the Department of Computer Science, University of Pisa. Full Professor from 2000 at the Department of Computer Science, University of Pisa. Research group Research group on Modelling, Simulation and Verification of Biological Systems Research - Formal Methods in Systems Biology - Process Algebras - Simulation of Biological Systems - Membrane Computing - Term Rewriting Systems - Computational models of evolution Publication Publications listed at University of Pisa Publications in DBLP
